Description: We are seeking a Radiologist who uses medical imaging techniques to diagnose and treat injuries and diseases to join our reputed facility. Radiologist Duties and Responsibilities ●      Reviewing and interpreting medical images to determine patient status and future medical care●      Determining the exact images required for diagnosis and delivering orders to Radiological Technicians●      Administering trace amounts of radioactive substances to create and enhance diagnostic images●      Performing minimally invasive surgical techniques such as embolization, angioplasty and ablation with image guidance ●      Working with Primary Care Doctors, Nurses and Radiology Technicians to administer treatment and manage pain●      Monitoring patient progress and adjusting treatment plans as necessary●      Creating a radiation treatment plan for patients with cancer●      Managing radiation side effects in cancer patients Skills
Skills: ●      Specialization degree and successful 5-years of residency
●      Proven success with relevant procedures and treatments
●      Compliance with all laws and hospital policies
●      Minimum 3-5 years of experience in the specialty is preferred
●      Good manners and effective communication skills.
